Select Comm AGENDA Jan Febr Cc Fire Chief Selection Committee Members Jeff Skilling Chairperson Troy Blakeney Gerald Smith Roel Campos and James Duke Congratulations selection committee members We have a very important and exciting task ahead of us On the agenda for the next week are two important items the Mayors February news conference announcing the Houston Fire Chief selection committee and its members and coordination of an action plan which we should work out prior to the news conference News Conference specifics speakers Mayor Brown and Jeff Skilling in attendance all selection committee members location Fire Station Washington Ave date Thursday February time pm duration approximately minutes Id like to emphasize that it would be ideal if all selection committee members were present at the news conference I will need bios on each committee member emailed to me by close of business Monday January These bios will be attached to a press release the Mayors Office is compiling Coordination of action plan Since we have only week between now and the news conference Jeff has proposed that he take a stab at putting together an initial draft He will then email to all committee members for commentssuggestions and make changes accordingly Hope this works for everyone if not give me a call Thanks Lisa

News Conference Layout Cc Febr at pm Location at a fire station in a Hispanic Community exact location will be forwarded shortly but estimated distance from ENE office less than min Expect News Conference to last a total of minutes including QA Jeff Skilling will be spokesperson for Selection Committee However we will try to have as many committee members present as possible Mayor will likely discuss estimated time min changes that are required at HFD potential need to bring in an outsider etc reasoning behind involvement of EnronJeff Skilling formation of selection committee depoliticize the process etc JS should speak about the following estimated time min how he became involved in the process how the committee members were selected who the members are with a brief background on each We plan to provide a bio on each of the committee members as part of the press release time line for Fire Chief selection QA estimated time min expect questions along the lines of Are the meetings going to be open or closed Outsider vs Insider related questions Please let me know if you have any questionscommentsissues with the above Ill coordinate collection of Bios from Committee members Anything else I can do to help out here Lisa

Select Comm Update Action Plan Cc I met with Troy Blakney this morning he has agreed to join the selection committee We plan to meet tomorrow with Red Duke lunch and Roel Campos breakfast Jeff has spoken with Gerald Smith and he has also agreed to join the committee In terms of an action plan Once we have finalized the committee members I will schedule a meeting preferably before the Febr scheduled news conference with all members to offer them an opportunity to meet one another and discuss how we will proceed Next I will begin scheduling meetings with some key people that would provide the committee with important insight into the key issues facing the HFD Jeff suggested possibly blocking out an entire day where the committee members would speak to these individuals back to back in or hour time slots Then a full day will be blocked out where the committee members will interview the approximate identified candidates The committee will then meet half a day to narrow the list of down to The three final candidates will be presented to the Mayor Lisa
